summary: New texture for vanilla female underwear featuring gold dragon on black silk with floral pattern
descriptionHtml:
New texture for vanilla female underwear featuring gold dragon on black silk with floral pattern.

Adds/Replaces:
skyrim/data/textures/actors/characters/female/femaleunderwear.dds

This is my first mod. I\'m pleased with it overall although there are some obvious problems. I may clean it up and offer it in different colors if there is any interest.
author: Poliorketika
